thread.title: Retired ministry sec-gen, son charged with graft
thread.title_full: Retired ministry sec-gen, son charged with graft

title: Retired ministry sec-gen, son charged with graft
text:
More 
Recently retired Rural and Regional Development Ministry secretary-general Mohd Arif Ab Rahman and his son Ahmad Zukhairi Mohd Arif, 35, were today charged at the Kuala Lumpur Sessions Court with corruption. 
Mohd Arif claimed trial to the charge of abetting his son to accept a S$200,000 bribe (RM550,000) from a solar electric company. 
This is so that the company could provide solar electricity devices on four remote islands near Sandakan at a cost of RM57.5 million. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
